title: E0BB3068-F7D4-47F2-A845-E86511891FCB
important_topics: Collaboration between financial institutions and law enforcement
fraud_tips: Educate individuals and communities about fraud prevention
Be skeptical of unsolicited requests for personal information
Be wary of phone calls or emails from individuals claiming to be authority figures
Establish joint accounts or power of attorney with trusted family members
Avoid sending gift cards or cash to unknown individuals
Be aware of grooming tactics used in romance and pig butchering scams
Be skeptical of investment opportunities that seem too good to be true
Contact local law enforcement for wellness checks on vulnerable individuals
tactics: Fraudsters pretending to be authority figures
Person in need scams targeting elderly individuals
Financial grooming in romance and pig butchering scams
Creating a false sense of urgency
Exploiting the fear, sense of duty, or confusion of elderly individuals
Using personal information found on social media to target victims
